Author: biobitch535
Text: So I have kids and its so hard to restrict with them.  All the do is eat ya know? Honestly, I wish I had a better answer for you but its just you have to mentally say no... I usually grab myself a diet coke when they snack ðŸ˜‘

Author: Sjkyordanuise
Text: Maybe start bringing your own lunches? I know the temptation of other foods will still be there, but sometimes bringing my own (and telling myself it's all I'm allowed) helps. Plus I feel accomplished going home knowing I stuck to my safe foods.
